mapper.select: select p.pdnum as pdnum, ps.prc, pl.plocation as plocation , substr(p.atclfetrdesc,1,8) as atclfetrdesc, ps.tradtpcd as tradtpcd, p.spc1, p.spc2 from product p, product_sale_info ps, product_location pl where p.pdnum= pl.pdnum and p.pdnum = ps.pdnum and p.rlettpcd='D02' and pl.plocation = #{location} order by ps.prc

select p.pdnum, ps.prc as prc, pl.plocation as plocation, p.atclfetrdesc as atclfetrdesc, ps.tradtpcd as tradtpcd, p.spc1, p.spc2 from product p, product_sale_info ps, product_location pl where p.pdnum= pl.pdnum and p.pdnum = ps.pdnum and p.rlettpcd='D02' and p.pdnum = #{pdnum} order by ps.prc

select p.pdnum , p.rlettpcd, ps.tradtpcd as tradtpcd, p.atclfetrdesc, p.taglist, p.rltrnm, ps.prc, pl.plocation as plocation from product p, product_sale_info ps, product_location pl where p.pdnum= pl.pdnum and p.pdnum = ps.pdnum
